notes.text: I tried my post nerf ninjas, very powerful imo, i needed about 35 wins from leg 1 to kog with ninjas, before i just chilled with fun decks or to test stuff, but now i tried hard with this ninja build and it was fun. I think it is at least tier 2.5 or 2 cuz i destroyed almost every tier 2/3 deck like AG, glads, dinos ect. Hardest match ups  were CA cuz they drew like gods and hazy, but only if i couldn't clear beast rising, same weakness as 3sd ninjas
